籤詩版本二:
Na sami wata taska a mafarkina na farka ban sani ba, na zaci Nanshan fartanya ce kawai.
Idan kun yi tambaya game da aure da rashin lafiya, kada ku nemi hanyoyin tallafa wa juna.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana wakiltar alamar samun taska a cikin mafarki.
Komai banza ne.
解曰: Abubuwa suna cikin ruwa. Siffai da tsayin inuwa. Duk an ƙaddara. Babu bukatar tattaunawa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ma Chao ya kori Cao
Ma Chao (176-222), mai suna Mengqi, ɗan asalin Fufeng Maoling ne (a yanzu arewa maso gabashin Xingping, lardin Shaanxi) ya kasance sanannen janar na daular Shu Han a ƙarshen daular Han da kuma zamanin masarautu uku.
A lokacin Mulkin Uku, Cao Cao ya kashe mahaifin Ma Chao. Ma Chao ya ɗauki fansa ya kai wa Cao Cao hari, amma Cao Cao ya ci nasara ya gudu.
Domin kada sojojin Ma Chao su gane, Cao Cao ya cire jar rigarsa, ya yanke gemunsa, ya gudu a kan doki.
A cikin mawuyacin lokaci, Cao Hong ya isa tare da sojojinsa cikin lokaci, ya dakatar da Ma Chao, ya ceci rayuwar Cao Cao daga ƙofar jahannama.
(Wannan labarin yana misalta yadda mutum zai kubuta daga haɗari ta hanyar barin shahararsa da matsayinsa.)
聖意: Idan gidanku bai da kyau, ku kiyayi neman kudi, hana mu'amala, wahalar da aure, jiran lokaci, Liujia tana addu'ar kariya, masu tafiya a kasa sun makara, tsutsotsin siliki sun tsaya, dabbobi kuma sun tsaya cak, jama'a suna neman jama'a. shari’a, hasarar sa’a, hasarar dukiya, cututtuka marasa amfani, addu’o’in neman yardar Allah, tsaunuka da kaburbura babu dadi.
